name: element-legacy
description: Community-maintained Element UI 2.x components for Vue 2.
author: Element Legacy Maintainers

scripts.build:theme: tsx ../../packages-private/build/src/gen-cssfile.ts && pnpm --filter @element-legacy/theme-chalk run build && cp-cli ../theme-chalk/lib lib/theme-chalk
scripts.clean: rimraf lib && rimraf packages/*/lib && rimraf test/**/coverage
scripts.deploy:build: npm run build:file && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ../../packages-private/build/webpack.demo.js && echo element.eleme.io>>../../apps/docs/element-ui/CNAME
scripts.dev: npm run bootstrap && npm run build:file && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --config ../../packages-private/build/webpack.demo.js & tsx ../../packages-private/build/src/template.ts
scripts.dev:play: npm run build:file && cross-env NODE_ENV=development PLAY_ENV=true webpack-dev-server --config ../../packages-private/build/webpack.demo.js
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build:file && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run build:utils && npm run build:theme
scripts.pub: npm run bootstrap && sh ../../packages-private/build/git-release.sh && sh ../../packages-private/build/release.sh && tsx ../../packages-private/build/src/gen-indices.ts
scripts.publish-packages: turbo run build lint test && changeset version && changeset publish
